game_description: Welcome to Monster Rampage - an exciting VR shooter game where you‚Äôll have to battle ruthless monsters. You‚Äôll need to use all your skills and resources to defend yourself against the monster invasion. You‚Äôll have to fight against a variety of enemies and upgrade your weapons to survive. Your task is to protect yourself and save humanity from destruction. You have the latest weapons and equipment in your arsenal to withstand the enemy army. You can use anything you find - from pistols to rocket launchers! In addition, you need to be careful and extremely attentive. Monsters can attack you from any angle, so you must always be on guard and remember to protect yourself. And don‚Äôt forget to use tactics and strategy in battle - monsters are smart and can outsmart you if you‚Äôre not focused. You‚Äôll face different types of enemies - from zombies to huge bosses. Your skills and expertise will be tested to the limit as you fight in epic battles. Monster Rampage is not just a shooter - it‚Äôs a full-fledged VR game that will allow you to fully immerse yourself in the world of real battles. Are you ready to be a part of this epic saga? Don't forget to join our awesome Discord server where we're waiting for all our players! We'll be posting the latest and most interesting news about the game there, so you won't miss a thing. Click on this link to join: https://discord.gg/wsSK3pjZRz
review_1: There's a lot of time and effort put into this game. There's good variety in enemy types. And it's good shooting fun with gun upgrades and good perks. --- What the game does need: I would really like it if we could walk in the lobby so I could get closer to the game windows while seating. The hit radius on enemies is pretty big and I think it should be nerfed a fair bit.
review_2: This is a very addicting game which never turns boring. Tho the one thing that I see that needs fixing are the perks that involve gold none of them really work, like the one you need to survive for 50 seconds to get 250 gold but the only gold I get is from killing the boss. But other than that the game gives hours of fun and fast paced gameplay.
review_3: I was expecting to hop in for a few minutes and have a bit of fun. I ended up playing for hours, grinding progression and trying out new weapon/perk combos. I would happily increase my rating to 5 stars, but I ran into a pretty major issue. Weapon pickups don't work on the second stage. They either act like solid walls or you pass through them with no option to equip. It seems the devs are active in to reviews here; please fix this so I can get back to grinding! Lol
review_4: Ok so from a VR veterans point of view, gameplay is simple and to the point. However I was met with more than I expected. Full set of unlockable weapons even if there's not 100, a decent list of achievements and looks like we have 3 levels to choose from in this rouge like monster shoot em up. Power ups, health, different weapons pop up in battle, wave upon waves of various monsters, and there are grenade pick ups similar to COD zombies that nuke em all out. I don't mind the gameplay I was surprised and thought it was going to be much worse. Now for the real talk. We need smooth turning first off, I did not find an option for that, and there weren't many so I'm guessing it's not there. Height adjustment is nice if your sitting. We need manual reload or at least something like zombieland to speed things up a bit. Graphics are ok, it's a work in progress and I can see the love being put in here. Im gonna keep it in the library hopefully we'll see some updates soon ü§òüòÅ
review_5: My type of personality, I get bored quickly. This game keeps me on my toes like Broadway Joe. Thank you for such a masterpiece. Finally, a creature of a game with some type of original thought.
